parameters.name: AttemptInterval
parameters.description: The time interval between retry attempts in case of a job failure. Unit: seconds. Default value: 30.

parameters.name: Calendar
parameters.description: If you set TimeType to 1 (cron), you can specify calendar days.

parameters.name: ClassName
parameters.description:
The full path of the job interface class.

This parameter is available only when you set JobType to java. You must enter a full path.

parameters.name: ConsumerSize
parameters.description: The number of threads that a single worker triggers simultaneously. You can specify this parameter for MapReduce jobs. Default value: 5.

parameters.name: ContactInfo
parameters.description: The information about the alert contact.

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The script content. This parameter is required when you set JobType to python, shell, go, or k8s.

parameters.name: DataOffset
parameters.description: If you set TimeType to 1 (cron), you can specify a time offset. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The job description.

parameters.name: DispatcherSize
parameters.description: The number of task distribution threads. This parameter is an advanced configuration item of the MapReduce job. Default value: 5.

parameters.name: ExecuteMode
parameters.description:
The execution mode of the job. Valid values:

*   **Stand-alone operation**
*   **Broadcast run**
*   **Visual MapReduce**
*   **MapReduce**
*   **Shard run**

parameters.name: FailEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to trigger an alert when a job fails. Valid values:

*   **true**: triggers an alert when a job fails.
*   **false**: does not trigger an alert when a job fails.

parameters.name: FailTimes
parameters.description: The maximum number of consecutive failures before an alert is triggered. An alert will be triggered if the number of consecutive failures reaches the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The application ID. You can obtain the application ID on the Application Management page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: JobType
parameters.description:
The job type. Valid values:

*   java
*   python
*   shell
*   go
*   http
*   xxljob
*   dataworks
*   k8s
*   springschedule

parameters.name: MaxAttempt
parameters.description: The maximum number of retry attempts in case of a job failure. Specify this parameter based on your business requirements. Default value: 0.

parameters.name: MaxConcurrency
parameters.description: The maximum number of concurrent instances. By default, only one instance can run at a time. When an instance is running, the next instance is not triggered even if the scheduled start time arrives.

parameters.name: MissWorkerEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to generate an alert if no machines are available to run the job. Valid values:

*   **true**: generates an alert if no machines are available to run the job.
*   **false**: does not generate an alert if no machines are available to run the job.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The job name.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace ID. You can obtain the namespace ID on the Namespace page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: NamespaceSource
parameters.description: The source of the namespace. You must specify this parameter only if the namespace is provided by a third party.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. You can specify this parameter for MapReduce jobs. Default value: 100.

parameters.name: Parameters
parameters.description: The user-defined parameters that you can obtain when the job is running.

parameters.name: QueueSize
parameters.description: The maximum capacity of the task queue. You can specify this parameter for MapReduce jobs. Default value: 10000.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID.

parameters.name: SendChannel
parameters.description: The method that is used to send alerts. Set the value to sms. Default value: sms.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the job. If this parameter is set to 0, the job is disabled. If this parameter is set to 1, the job is enabled. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: SuccessNoticeEnable
parameters.description: Specifies whether to send notifications for successfully running the job.

parameters.name: TaskAttemptInterval
parameters.description: The time interval between retry attempts in case of a job failure. This parameter is an advanced configuration item of the MapReduce job. Default value: 0.

parameters.name: TaskMaxAttempt
parameters.description: The maximum number of retry attempts in case of a job failure. This parameter is an advanced configuration item of the MapReduce job. Default value: 0.

parameters.name: TimeExpression
parameters.description:
The time expression. Specify the time expression based on the value of TimeType:

*   If you set TimeType to **1** (cron), specify this parameter to a standard CRON expression.
*   If you set TimeType to **100** (api), no time expression is required.
*   If you set TimeType to **3** (fixed_rate), specify this parameter to a fixed frequency in seconds. For example, if you set this parameter to 30, the system triggers a job every 30 seconds.
*   If you set TimeType to **4** (second_delay), specify this parameter to a fixed delay after which the job is triggered. Valid values: 1 to 60. Unit: seconds.
*   If you set TimeType to **5** (one_time), specify this parameter to a specific time point at which the job is triggered. The time is in the format of yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss, such as 2022-10-10 10:10:00, or a timestamp in milliseconds.

parameters.name: TimeType
parameters.description:
The time type. Valid values:

*   **1**: cron
*   **3**: fixed_rate
*   **4**: second_delay
*   **5**: one_time
*   **100**: api

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: The timeout threshold. Unit: seconds. Default value: 7200.

parameters.name: TimeoutEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the timeout alert feature. If the feature is enabled, an alert will be triggered upon a timeout. Valid values:

*   **true**: enables the timeout alert feature.
*   **false**: disables the timeout alert feature.

parameters.name: TimeoutKillEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the timeout termination feature. If the feature is enabled, a job will automatically be terminated if it times out. Valid values:

*   **true**: enables the timeout termination feature.
*   **false**: disables the timeout termination feature.

parameters.name: Timezone
parameters.description: Time zone.

parameters.name: XAttrs
parameters.description: The extended attributes. If you set JobType to k8s, this parameter is required. For a job whose resource type is Job-YAML, set this parameter to {"resource":"job"}. For a job whose resource type is Shell-Script, set this parameter to {"image":"busybox","resource":"shell"}.
